DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Domain Regimen-Limiting Toxicity Correct Classification Yes No Indeterminate Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication as to whether or not Regimen-Limiting Toxicities/Dose-Limiting Toxicities were correctly identified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Domain Regimen-Limiting Toxicity Correct Classification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to an adverse event._A side effect of a drug or other treatment that is serious enough to necessitate a dose modification._Free from error; especially conforming to fact or truth._A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to an adverse event.

Property.preferredDefinition: A side effect of a drug or other treatment that is serious enough to necessitate a dose modification.:Free from error; especially conforming to fact or truth.:A method of generalization, the systematic arrangement of entities into classes or groups based on mutual similarity and certain differing characteristics.

Free from error; especially conforming to fact or truth.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the site reported DLTs during this reporting period, were all of the DLTs reported by the institution, correctly classified, according to the protocol specifications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the study chair in agreement with all of the institution determined dose-finding course adverse event grades, attributions, or DLT statuses for this patient
